scenarios.title: Artificial Intelligence in Healthcare

persona.name: User 1
persona.background: 5 years experience in healthcare data analysis, with a strong understanding of machine learning and data privacy regulations
persona.goals: Develop and implement predictive analytics models to improve patient outcomes, while ensuring the security and privacy of sensitive medical information

scenarios.initial_question: How can AI improve patient outcomes in healthcare?
